Module com.ning.breakout
Package com.ning.breakout.view

Class BrickFactory

java.lang.Object
com.ning.breakout.view.BrickFactory
public class BrickFactory extends Object
BrickFactory is the class which takes the responsibility of making bricks for all levels of the game.
Author:
Ning ZHU - modified

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BrickFactory(javafx.scene.Group group, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio)
    The class constructor sets the container of the view of the bricks produced in the brick factory, the number of bricks and the number of brick lines (rows) in a level, and the ratio of the width and height of the produced bricks.

  • Constructor Details

    • BrickFactory

      public BrickFactory(javafx.scene.Group group, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio)
      The class constructor sets the container of the view of the bricks produced in the brick factory, the number of bricks and the number of brick lines (rows) in a level, and the ratio of the width and height of the produced bricks.

      The brickCount here is not the real number of bricks after making. To make sure each line of bricks is full, the real number of the bricks may slightly change.

      Parameters:
      group - the container of the view of produced bricks
      brickCount - the pre-defined number of bricks in a level
      lineCount - the number of bricks line in a level
      brickDimensionRatio - the ratio of the width and height of the brick
      See Also:
      • Group

  • Method Details

    • makeLevel

      public Brick[] makeLevel(int level, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle drawArea)
      Makes bricks of specified level for the game.

      The position of the bricks depends on the draw area of the game board (boundary of the game board).

      Parameters:
      level - the game level user will play
      drawArea - the boundary of the game board
      Returns:
      bricks of specified level
      See Also:
      • Rectangle
      • Brick
